name: @vanillawc/wc-markdown
author: Evan Plaice <evanplaice@gmail.com> (http://evanplaice.com/)
description: A vanilla Markdown web component with optional syntax highlighting

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:src && npm run build:assets
scripts.package: npx rimraf package && npm pack | tail -n 1 | xargs tar -xf
scripts.version: npm run build && git add dist/* && git diff --quiet && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -am 'Bump'
